meanings.definition: A synthetic form of vitamin B12.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed cyanocobalamine to boost my vitamin levels.
meanings.sent2: Many people take cyanocobalamine supplements to stay healthy.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally spilled cyanocobalamine powder all over the kitchen counter!
meanings.sent4: Her energy levels skyrocketed after starting cyanocobalamine treatment.
meanings.sent5: The bright blue color of cyanocobalamine tablets made them easy to spot.

meanings.definition: A nutrient essential for red blood cell formation.
meanings.sent1: Eating foods rich in cyanocobalamine helps in making red blood cells.
meanings.sent2: Cyanocobalamine deficiency can lead to anemia.
meanings.sent3: The red blood cells threw a party to celebrate the arrival of cyanocobalamine!
meanings.sent4: Her bloodstream flowed smoothly with the help of cyanocobalamine.
meanings.sent5: The importance of cyanocobalamine for blood health cannot be overstated.

meanings.definition: Used to treat vitamin B12 deficiency.
meanings.sent1: The doctor recommended cyanocobalamine injections for the deficiency.
meanings.sent2: Cyanocobalamine is a common remedy for vitamin B12 deficiency.
meanings.sent3: The vitamin deficiency ran away as soon as cyanocobalamine arrived!
meanings.sent4: Her health improved significantly after starting cyanocobalamine therapy.
meanings.sent5: The miraculous effects of cyanocobalamine on deficiency were evident within weeks.
